item.description:
Bonjour! Cinestudio at Trinity College will be presenting "Paris je t'aime" a film of short vignettes about Paris. For those interested, we will meet at 6PM for great pizza nearby beforehand. Otherwise, we'll meet at 7:20 or so in the lobby of Cinestudio on Summit Street in Hartford. We will be inviting other area film and French groups and would welcome people who haven't come to a French meetup before. If you have questions or would like to carpool, just email me.
This meetup is in addition to our conversation meetups on the 2nd and 4th Wednesdays.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: French film
